message.body: Hey! Just was wondering if there is any chance since Titan is lame that I could have a flat lesson on lucky this weekend. I understand totally if you were going to have a lesson on him. I hope you don't mind me asking. Again I completely Understand if you want to ride him
Girl I don't mind a bit! Go right ahead. You can jump if you want too, all good. Just let me know what day? I will work on the dressage magic with $!
Okay! Thank you!!! I think we are shooting for Saturday. Brenna is organizing a lesson schedule - do you want one on dollar?
Great! I do, I'll check in with Brenna, I'm running a race in the morning
We are going to go to HP on Sunday want to go?
I'm Going to take Titan and just hack him
Caitlin is taking Louie and Brenna is going too
Haha honest answer is not really?? :/
Yeah you are right Sally is a total dominator. Ha! Luck-meister was good!!
